title: Chinese Agent Proposed Violent Means to End Dissident’s Congress Run, DOJ Says
sub_head: Prosecutors unseal complaints accusing Chinese government agents of targeting dissidents in U.S., including father of U.S. figure skater Alysa Liu
body: A Chinese spy hired a private investigator to use violence if necessary to end a candidate’s run for Congress, instructing him to “beat him until he cannot run for election,” prosecutors alleged as they unsealed a series of complaints accusing Chinese agents of harassing dissidents living in the U.S.
